game.title: The Dragon's Treasure
game.#text:
Objective: Retrieve the Dragon's Treasure
	 Description: You will set out on a perilous journey to the Dragon's Lair. Your objective is to retrieve the treasure that the Dragon has been hoarding for years. Beware, the Dragon is very protective of its treasure.
	 Reward: 5000 Gold and a Dragon Scale Shield
	 Quest-giver: Mazog The Wise
	 Tasks:
		- Reach the Dragon's Lair
		- Retrieve the Dragon's Treasure
		- Release the Dragon from his prison
